headline: Synopsys Deepens AI Design And Security Reach With SimuTech Partnership
summary: SimuTech Group, part of the Synopsys portfolio, was named 2025 Worldwide Channel Partner of the Year, underscoring its role within the company’s partner network. Synopsys (NasdaqGS:SNPS) is expanding AI driven design capabilities across its tools and workflows. The company is pursuing acquisitions aimed at strengthening its software integrity and security offerings. For you as an investor watching Synopsys, the focus is on how these moves fit into its core position in electronic design...
